H0.text: To which group of primates do Aye Ayes belong. Tarsier

H1.text: To which group of primates do Aye Ayes belong. Lorises

H2.text: To which group of primates do Aye Ayes belong. Bushbabies

H3.text: To which group of primates do Aye Ayes belong. Lemur

A4.text: The aye-aye (genus Daubentonia) has been classified as a specialized indriid, a sister group to all strepsirrhines.

A5.text: The aye-aye was placed in its own infraorder, Chiromyiformes, while the rest of the lemurs were placed in Lemuriformes.
